name: Format\MoveInAnimation
description: The animation whereby a component moves in from the side of the screen.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Always move_in for this animation type.

properties.name: preferredStartingPosition
properties.description: A string that indicates which side of the screen should be the starting point of the animation.

properties.name: userControllable
properties.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the animation occurs in response to user action (true) or happens automatically (false).
